text: [Music]
hello I'm Ashley a basic support
engineer working at the Amazon web
service office in Cape Town South Africa
today I'm going to show you how to
update the email address on an AWS
account so let's get
started you can update the email address
on an AWS account only if the AWS
account already exists and has complete
the activation process first let's log
in to the AWS Management console if
create a new AWS account is displayed
then we would need to sign in to the AWS
account let's sign
in if you're already logged in to the
AWS Management console but you don't see
your account information first select
your account ID at the upper right Cor
corner of the screen and then select
account from the drop-down
list now choose edit next to account
settings on the update account settings
page choose edit next to the email
address enter in your new email address
in the new email address section repeat
this in the confirm new email address
section now enter your password
choose save
changes after you save these changes a
verification code is sent to the new
email address retrieve the code that was
sent to the new email address typically
it arrives within a few minutes after
you enter this code select save changes
and now you know how to update the email
address associated with your AWS
account thanks for watching and happy
cloud computing from all of us here at a
WS
[Music]
